information: The maximum number of points is 90. Cross-check criterias:

criteria.text: The welcome page should contain general information about the developers, project, and course
n the upper right corner there are 2 buttons: Sign In and Sign Up
If login token is valid and unexpired (user exists in db), change the Sign In and Sign Up buttons to the "Go to Main Page" button
When the token expires (user has been deleted from the db) - the user should be redirected to the "Welcome page" automatically
Pressing the Sign In / Sign up button redirects a user to the route with the Sign In / Sign up form
Buttons for Sign In / Sign Up / Sign Out are everywhere where they should be according to requirements
Client-side validation should is implemented
Upon successful login, the user is redirected to the Main page
Already logged on attempt to reach those routes should be redirected to the Main page
Working editor allowing to edit and execute the query
Working documentation explorer, should be visible only when sdl request will succeed (please, check the response status before providing a score)
Variables section. Should be closed/opened. Variables should be used in query on request
Response section
Localization
Sticky header
React default favicon
The presence of errors and warnings in the console, per each
The presence in the console of the results of the console.log execution, per each
@ts-ignore or any usage (search through github repo), per each
Making commits after the deadline
